name: taxhacker
description: TaxHacker is a self-hosted script and toolkit that helps calculate and optimize income or investment taxes using country-specific rules. It focuses on automation, reproducible calculations, and transparent tax estimation from local data.
features: Tax calculation: Calculate income and investment taxes using country-specific rules and regulations.
Automated processing: Process financial data automatically to generate tax estimates and reports.
Reproducible results: Ensure consistent calculations with documented formulas and transparent methodology.
Local data storage: Keep all financial data on your own infrastructure for maximum privacy and security.
Multiple jurisdictions: Support for various tax jurisdictions with customizable rules and rates.
Investment tracking: Track capital gains, dividends, and other investment income for accurate tax reporting.
Optimization suggestions: Identify potential tax optimization strategies based on your financial situation.
Report generation: Generate detailed tax reports and summaries for filing or review purposes.
Historical tracking: Maintain records of past calculations and tax years for comparison and auditing.
Custom rules: Define custom tax rules and scenarios to match your specific situation or jurisdiction.
Data import: Import financial data from various sources including CSV files and bank statements.
Transparent calculations: Review step-by-step calculations to understand how tax estimates are derived.
